trans-unit.source: This tutorial is based on the code you download in the Mobile Services quickstart.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial is based on the code you download in the Mobile Services quickstart.

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must first complete either [Get started with Mobile Services] or [Add Mobile Services to an existing app].
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must first complete either [Get started with Mobile Services] or [Add Mobile Services to an existing app].

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] If you completed the quickstart tutorial prior to the release of Azure Mobile Services Android SDK 2.0, you must re-do it, because the SDK is not backwards compatible.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] If you completed the quickstart tutorial prior to the release of Azure Mobile Services Android SDK 2.0, you must re-do it, because the SDK is not backwards compatible.

trans-unit.source: To verify the version, check the **dependencies** section of your project's **build.gradle** file.
trans-unit.target: To verify the version, check the **dependencies** section of your project's **build.gradle** file.
